meanings.definition: Extend over so as to cover partly.
meanings.sent1: The colorful rugs were overlapping on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The two blankets overlapped on the bed.
meanings.sent3: The cats were playing hide and seek under the overlapping blankets.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the trees were overlapping like a protective canopy.
meanings.sent5: The shadows of the buildings created an overlapping pattern on the sidewalk.

meanings.sent1: The schedules of the two meetings were overlapping in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: Our interests overlapped, and we found common ground.
meanings.sent3: The songs playing on the radio were overlapping, creating a funny mix.
meanings.sent4: Their ideas overlapped like two circles in a Venn diagram.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the paintings were overlapping, blending into a beautiful masterpiece.
